# [Interview #622: Reddit AMA 2011, Entry #55](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=622#55)

#### [puckthepirateÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/k0fp8/iama_professional_fantasy_novelist_named_brandon/c2gk703)

Do you listen to music when you write? What are you currently listening to?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes. I use various Pandora stations for different moods.

Right now, it's one based on Tangerine Dream.
